plugins.name: spec-dev
plugins.description: Multi-agent spec-driven development workflow with code review. Use /prime-spec for complex features, /prime-tech for technical design, /prime-build for implementation, or /prime-simple for quick features. Flow: requirements → specification → implementation → code review → QA verification.

plugins.name: mcp-builder
plugins.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services through well-designed tools. Use when building MCP servers to integrate external APIs or services, whether in Python (FastMCP) or Node/TypeScript (MCP SDK).

plugins.name: pdf
plugins.description: Comprehensive PDF manipulation toolkit for extracting text and tables, creating new PDFs, merging/splitting documents, and handling forms. When Claude needs to fill in a PDF form or programmatically process, generate, or analyze PDF documents at scale.

plugins.name: xlsx
plugins.description: Comprehensive spreadsheet creation, editing, and analysis with support for formulas, formatting, data analysis, and visualization. When Claude needs to work with spreadsheets (.xlsx, .xlsm, .csv, .tsv, etc) for creating new spreadsheets, analyzing data, modifying existing spreadsheets, or recalculating formulas.

plugins.name: pptx
plugins.description: Presentation creation, editing, and analysis. When Claude needs to work with presentations (.pptx files) for creating new presentations, modifying or editing content, working with layouts, or adding comments and speaker notes.

plugins.name: docx
plugins.description: Comprehensive document creation, editing, and analysis with support for tracked changes, comments, formatting preservation, and text extraction. When Claude needs to work with professional documents (.docx files) for creating new documents, modifying content, working with tracked changes, or adding comments.

plugins.name: doc-writer
plugins.description: Write clear, effective technical documentation following industry-proven patterns from exemplary projects (React, Rust, Stripe, Twilio) and authoritative style guides (Google, Diátaxis, Write the Docs, Microsoft). Use when creating or improving READMEs, API docs, tutorials, guides, or any technical documentation.

plugins.name: claude-code-knowledge
plugins.description: Official Claude Code documentation access including comprehensive skill creation guide. Provides instant reference to hooks, MCP, skills, slash commands, settings, CLI, and all Claude Code features with automatic sync from docs.anthropic.com. Includes helper scripts for creating, validating, and packaging skills.

plugins.name: path-test
plugins.description: Testing plugin to discover how Claude Code resolves file paths from plugin commands. Contains multiple test commands each using different path resolution strategies.
